thread.title: Princess Diana Looks That Define Spring/Summer 2017 | British Vogue
thread.title_full: Princess Diana Looks That Define Spring/Summer 2017 | British Vogue

title: Princess Diana Looks That Define Spring/Summer 2017 | British Vogue
text: Princess Diana The Spring Summer Trends Princess Diana Wore First The spring/summer 2017 collections may have come almost 20 years after the tragic death of Princess Diana, but her style credentials have never seemed more in vogue. Ahead of the opening of the Diana: Her Fashion Story exhibition at Kensington Palace later this month - which will include her standout looks from the Eighties and Nineties - Vogue 's Julia Hobbs picks out seven times the late Princess's style proved to be well ahead of the fashion curve.
